titleStmt.title: The right notion of honour as it was delivered in a sermon before the King at Newmarket, Octob. 4, 1674. Published by His Majesties special command. : With annotations, the contents whereof are in the following leaf / by Nath. Vincent, D.D. Chaplain in Ordinary to His Majesty, and Fellow of Clare-Hall in Cambridge.
titleStmt.author: Vincent, Nathanael, 1639?-1697.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Richard Chiswell at the Rose and Crown in S. Paul's Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Annotations appear on pages 1 and 2 of second pagination. "A general address to all bountiful encouragers of religion and learning, ... in Cambridge:" pages 3-7.
Formerly Wing V419 (number cancelled in Wing 2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in: University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
